entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 a.m. ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 3:00 PM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3 except zero over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3 except zero over the Highlands. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023
